fields.comment: If true, will pick up _any_ item. Breaks all kinds of things, but maybe mods will find this fun to mess around with
fields.name: pick_up_any_item_buggy

fields.comment: if set, won't drop the wand if kicked. Mainly used by wand ghosts.
fields.name: is_immune_to_kicks

fields.comment: picks up this entity and only this entity. Overrides the is_in_npc checks that try to limit things to pickuppable wands
fields.name: only_pick_this_entity

fields.comment: if true, will drop all items. E.g. if true for player, player drops their wands
fields.name: drop_items_on_death
